nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 24 is the twenty-fourth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Kidnapped!," by Ian Flynn, and "Tales from Wild Space: Win/Lose," by Shaun Harris. The issue was published on August 21, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
With hotshot Resistance pilot Poe Dameron captured by pirates, it's up to BB-8—and Rapier Squadron—to save the day!
